price: Por certo, Abraão era prócer, devoto a Allah, monoteísta sincero, e não era dos idólatras.
arabic: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةٗ قَانِتٗا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
